long_description:
Through February 28, 2017

San Francisco is easy to fall in love with – and in San Francisco it’s easy to fall in love. The stunning views, the iconic hills, the epic gardens and the Golden Gate Bridge – these all add to the romance in the air in the City by the Bay. It’s no surprise then that people tend to leave leave their heart here as well. As an ode to our beautiful city, our “I Left My

Toast to your S.O. with a bottle of Napa sparkling wine, and indulge in local, handmade chocolates from Nuubia while you take in the spectacular views from your Stanford Court Hotel room. Look out over Alcatraz, or toward the lights of the Financial District. We’ll take care of all the romantic details. And if you’re in the mood for a romantic dinner, we’ll even make your reservations.

Let Stanford Court steal your heart this February. Book now.

***

The “I Left My <3 in SanFrancisco" Valentine’s Day package runs through the end of February. Book it for a romantic holiday, or just because.
